product_name: Alchemy Goods Haversack Shoulder Bag - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Comprised of reclaimed bicycle inner tubes and a seat-belt strap, this compact, water-resistant bag delivers all-purpose function and style for environmentally-conscious commuters with limited cargo.
short_description: Comprised of reclaimed bicycle inner tubes and a seat-belt strap, this compact, water-resistant bag delivers all-purpose function and style for environmentally-conscious commuters with limited cargo.
